message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take the majority, but you'll get a decent chunk too!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering I'm the one proposing this round. Let's see if you agree.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I think I deserve the majority this time around!
Let's try 70/30. I'm being generous here, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll give you a tiny share if you accept this offer. Don't expect much!
I'm getting impatient. Let's go with 80/20. If you reject this, we might both end up with nothing.
